alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 13 at 2:31PM CDT until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River At Edinburg. * WHEN...From late Friday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Some dirt roads near the river are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 9.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Saturday morning and continue rising to a crest of 24.5 feet early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 24.6 feet on 08/26/2022. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Pearl River Edinburg 20.0 9.2 Thu 1 pm CDT 16.4 22.6 24.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued tonight at 9PM CDT.
